title:
Nature Photography - Pattern in a Basket of Roses, Louisville, Kentucky, USA  by Adam Jones

Happy June...

object.content:
Nature Photography - Pattern in a Basket of Roses, Louisville, Kentucky, USA  by Adam Jones

Happy June Birthdays! Your birth flower is the rose. In the US and Europe, roses are often associated with love and romance, but did you know each color has its own meaning as well? The roses here mean enthusiasm (orange), love at first sight (purple), gratitude (dark pink), admiration (light pink), joy (yellow), and love (red). Plus, a bundle of thirteen roses like this one means you have a secret admirer! 

The artist, Adam Jones, is a nature and travel photographer who has been behind the camera for over 30 years. When he's not on photography tours or leading workshops on digital photography, Jones lives in Crestwood, Kentucky. His images are highly regarded internationally and have appeared in publications by National Geographic Books, Time, Life Magazine, National Wildlife Federation, Audubon, Sierra Club, and Disney. He also works for advertising campaigns including clients like  Canon, Ford, Eddie Bauer, Miller Beer and Honda.

More early June bloomers await you in our Spring Art gallery: http://www.art.com/gallery/id--b12140/spring-posters.htm?rfid=978544
